text: Experiencing an issue with cloning a theme within client portals. Clients purchase from the marketplace but the theme is not clone-able. No error message other than this: - Any ideas what can be causing this? This is happening in all portals.
Hello!  I want to create a option for CTA button . But I have this error 'Error:'cta' is a restricted field type' . Can someone help me with this ?

Hi everyone ! I'm stuck in an issue please help me to fix it.
I'm trying to submit a template pack for approval but while submitting, I'm getting below error message

Module may not work correctly in blog templates (Techblaze_Blog) (template Techblaze_Blog)

Please tell me why I'm getting this error message even if i delete the particular module.
Hey <@U2H1Q3F8R> can you DM me your portal ID and what theme you're trying to clone? I wasn't able to reproduce in my portal
Hello, is there a way to activate the styles options section in the custom drag and drop modules?
I think its something in discussion, but the feature is not available
I've gotten the same message a few times. However,  after a few tries is does eventually clone the theme.
